Class RuntimeMojoSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      org.codehaus.gmaven.plugin.MojoSupport
          org.codehaus.gmaven.plugin.RuntimeMojoSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleMojo, ExecuteMojo, ShellMojo
public abstract class RuntimeMojoSupport
extends MojoSupport

Support for Mojo implementations which require GroovyRuntime and related facilities.

Since:
2.0
